alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:38PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT AREAS NEAR PAYSON, PINE, RYE, and Fossil CREEK THROUGH 515 PM MST... At 437 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Washington Park to near Payson to 13 miles east of Jakes Corner. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Star Valley, Mesa Del Caballo, Geronimo Estates, Freedom Acres, Strawberry, East Verde Estates, Whispering Pines, Childs Power Plant, Rye, Oxbow Estates, Round Valley, Flowing Springs, Gisela, Pine, Washington Park, Jakes Corner, Horseshoe Reservoir, Geronimo Boy Scout Camp, and Beaver Valley. This includes the following highways... State Route 288 between mile markers 290 and 296. State Route 260 between mile markers 227 and 260. State Route 188 between mile markers 267 and 276. State Route 87 southbound between mile markers 241 and 251. State Route 87 between mile markers 230 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
